texts.value: Strength has solved all of your problems. There's nothing you can't tough out. Any pain you've endured has rewarded you twice over.
The mystical nature of this world unravels at the snap of your fingers. Some call this intelligence. You call it imagination.
Your ability to focus in any situation has made you a great hunter and scavenger. Your dexterity knows no bounds.
Quick, silent, and lucky. The only people who remember your face are the ones who see it before entering the gates of heaven.
